org.openbase.bco.dal.remote.layer.unit

Class UnitRemoteFactoryImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openbase.bco.dal.remote.layer.unit.UnitRemoteFactoryImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UnitRemoteFactory, org.openbase.jul.pattern.Factory<UnitRemote,rst.domotic.unit.UnitConfigType.UnitConfig>

    public class UnitRemoteFactoryImpl
extends Object
implements UnitRemoteFactory
    A unit remote factory which can be used to create unit remote instances out of the unit registry delivered unit configurations.
    Author:
    Divine Threepwood
